Generation IX.Scarlet: Fezandipiti owes its beautiful looks and lovely voice to the toxic stimulants emanating from the chain wrapped around its body.
Generation IX.Violet: Fezandipiti beats its glossy wings to scatter pheromones that captivate people and Pokémon.
